availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Arthur J. Harrington (Jefferson County, KY, printer and soldier)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, printer and soldier. Native of England. Married to Eliza Harrington. Father of Sarah Florence Harrington and Ruth Harrington. Printer in Jefferson County in 1860. Printer in Jefferson County in 1863. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A) as a first lieutenant from January 10, 1862, to February 25, 1863 (resigned). Served in the 1st Regiment Capital Guards as a major from August 11, 1864, to June 1, 1865 (resigned).

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 82.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 5, p. 509B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), 5th Congressional District, KY, July 1863, p. 214, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 348.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 2861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1867), 98, 754, 925.
Find A Grave, "Arthur J. Harrington (c.1831-1876)," Memorial #94886535, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94886535 (accessed October 6, 2018).
